attributes.additional_details:
There are holes all over the village and both of the roundabouts and the road from the rail crossing past the coop to the roundabout is absolutely dreadful.
I have never seen the village in such a bad state, its not only shocking but it dangerous as well, Please help to make our village safer and to get our village resurfaced by  signing and share this petition thank you .
attributes.background: The road surfaces of Gobowen are so bad, the hole village needs to be resurfaced.
